info.description:
# Introduction

The CB Insights API offers market data and insights you won't find anywhere else. Use our API to build trading platforms, media content, and market indexes, or integrate our proprietary scores into your workflows, algorithms, or LLMs. 

# CB Insights API v2 compared to v1

The new CB Insights API v2 offers new datasets and additional data points that were not available in v1. v2 follows the same REST architectural style and has a new structure for you to retrieve the information you need as conveniently as possible.

This first set of data includes:

- **Firmographics**. Profiles on private companies, public companies, and investors. Includes general information like location, headcount, and industry, as well as proprietary data like business models, Competitor Scores, and Expert Collections.
- **Financial Transactions**. Funding deals, cap table history, M&As, and IPOs, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
- **Business Relationships**. Partnerships, clients/vendors, and licensing activity, plus AI-generated insights to predict future M&As and shifts in strategy.
- **Management and Board**. Leadership teams, board members, and the Management factor of the Mosaic Score — our proprietary algorithm which evaluates leadership teams based on past achievements.
- **Outlook**. Proprietary data science analysis including Mosaic Score, Commercial Maturity, and Exit Probability. Proven to predict winners better than top VCs.
- **Scouting Reports**. On-demand, AI-generated insights into business model, market position, strengths, and opportunities for private companies.
info.title: CB Insights API

post.description: Authorize a client using client ID and client secret. Returns a bearer token to be used in subsequent requests. The client ID and client secret are provided by CB Insights. To receive your client ID and client secret, please contact your Customer Success Manager or email info@cbinsights.com.
post.summary: Authorize a client

post.description: Retrieved data includes partnerships, client/vendor relationships, and licensing activity, plus AI-generated insights to predict future M&As and shifts in strategy for each organization.
post.summary: Retrieve business relationships for multiple organizations.

parameters.description: Search parameters to request business relationship information.
parameters.name: request

post.description: See https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/portal/docs/CBI-API/ChatCBI for more information and usage details. This endpoint uses generative AI and may make mistakes. Always verify pertinent information.
post.summary: Converse with the beta version of our AI chatbot ChatCBI

post.description: Response is a series of incremental chunks. See https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/portal/docs/CBI-API/ChatCBI for more information and usage details. This endpoint uses generative AI and may make mistakes. Always verify pertinent information.
post.summary: Converse with the beta version of our AI chatbot ChatCBI, which responds via incremental chunks

post.description: Returns a list of funding information for organizations based on the Org IDs provided, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List of funding information for one or more organizations

post.description: Returns a list of investment rounds in which the requested Org IDs participated in, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List of investments rounds for one or more organizations

post.description: Returns a list of exit rounds for companies in which the requested Org IDs invested prior to the exit, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List of portfolio exits for one or more organizations

post.description: Retrieve a list of profiles on private companies, public companies, and investors based on the parameters defined in the request body.
post.summary: List profiles of companies.

parameters.description: Search parameters to request a list of organization profiles. You must pass at least one search parameter. Each field creates an AND condition while each value within a field creates an OR. For example, a request containing orgIds 144613 and 234543, and sectorIds 12 and 27, will return profiles of the organizations with orgIds matching 144613 OR 234543 and sector IDs matching 12 OR 27.
parameters.name: request

post.description: Retrieved data includes information about leadership team, board members, and Management Mosaic score — CB Insights proprietary algorithm evaluating leadership teams based on past achievements.
post.summary: Retrieve details about management and board for a list of organizations

post.description: Returns a list of organizations with basic information about those organizations, based on the parameters defined in the request body. This endpoint never charges credits. You can use this endpoint to match CBI organizations with your own data prior to spending credits on them.
post.summary: List basic organization information.

parameters.description: Search parameters to request organization information. You must pass at least one search parameter.
parameters.name: request

post.description: Retrieved data includes partnerships, client/vendor relationships, and licensing activity, plus AI-generated insights to predict future M&As and shifts in strategy.
post.summary: Retrieve business relationships for an organization.

post.description: Get commercial maturity history for the org with orgId
post.summary: Retrieves historical commercial maturity scores.

post.description: Get exit probability history for the org with orgId
post.summary: Retrieves historical exit probability data.

post.description: Retrieved data includes details about funding received by an organization, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List funding transactions for a single organization.

post.description: Retrieves all transactions in which the selected organization invested in another organization, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List investment rounds for a single organization.

parameters.description: CB Insights unique identifier of an organization
parameters.name: orgId

post.description: Retrieves exit rounds for companies in which the selected organization invested prior to the exit, plus AI-generated insights that extract key themes.
post.summary: List portfolio exits for a single organization.

parameters.description: CB Insights unique identifier of an organization
parameters.name: orgId

post.description: Retrieved data includes information about leadership team, board members, and Management Mosaic score — CB Insights proprietary algorithm evaluating leadership teams based on past achievements.
post.summary: Retrieve details about management and board for an organization.

post.description: Get mosaic history for the org with orgId
post.summary: Retrieves historical mosaic scores.

post.description: Returns values for the current commercial maturity, health, and exit probability scores. Proven to predict winners better than top VCs. More about proprietary datasets: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/sections/360008544011-Proprietary-Datasets.
post.summary: Retrieve details about business outlook of an organization

post.description: Due to the substantial processing involved in generating a Scouting Report, this call may take several minutes. If you'd like to stream the report as it's generated, please use the `/v2/organizations/{orgId}/scoutingreportstream` endpoint.
post.summary: Generates a Scouting Report for an organization.

parameters.description: CB Insights organization ID; only active companies are eligible
parameters.name: orgId

post.description: Delivered as a series of chunks, where each chunk is a JSON object, with data progressively added in each new chunk. If a server-side error occurs mid-stream, an object will be written containing the key `"error"` and you will not be charged a credit.
post.summary: Generates a Scouting Report for an organization and delivers it as a stream.

parameters.description: CB Insights organization ID; only active companies are eligible
parameters.name: orgId

post.description: Returns a list of outlook information for organizations based on the Org IDs provided.
post.summary: List of outlook information for one or more organizations

parameters.description: Search parameters to request outlook information.
parameters.name: request

insights.description: CB Insights proprietary generated insights about this relationship.

newsSnippet.description: A news snippet about this business relationship.

partners.description: A list of business partners involved.

relationshipId.description: A unique ID which identifies this relationship.

sources.description: A list of sources of information about this business relationship.

startDate.description: The date when this business relationship began (YYYY-MM-DD).

businessRelationships.description: A list of items containing details regarding a business relationship for a given organization.

details.description: The list of insights regarding this relationship.
example: The funding round propelled Stripe's valuation to $3.5 billion
Stripe's partnership with tech giants like Apple and Twitter for payment processing indicates strategic positioning for expanding its market share and influence in the digital economy.

headline.example: Stripe's valuation swells with latest funding, bolstering its market position

sources.description: A list of sources the insights are based on.

v2BusinessRelationships.MultipleOrganiza.description: Search parameters to request business relationship information one or more organizations

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

orgIds.description: CB Insights organization IDs to return.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

orgs.description: A list of organizations with their business relationship details included.

content.description: A small portion of the news article about this business relationship.
content.example: MLB and Google are also collaborating on original content programming showing how baseball fans are enhancing their League Championship Series experiences using the Assistant wherever they are.

title.description: The title of the news article about this business relationship.
title.example: Stripe's partnership with tech giants like Apple and Twitter for payment processing indicates strategic positioning for expanding its market share and influence in the digital economy.

url.description: The URL of the news source about this business relationship.

businessRelationships.description: A list of items containing details regarding a business relationship for a given organization.

country.description: The country where the partner's headquarters is located.

name.description: The name of the partner organization.

orgId.description: The CB Insights organization ID of this partner.

role.description: The role that this business partner plays in the relationship (Partner, Vendor, Client, Licensor, Licensee, Supplier, Distributor, Sponsor, Sponsored).

date.description: The date this source was published.

title.example: Orange goes submarine with Google cable partnership

url.description: The URL pointing to this source.

chatID.description: A unique id for the conversation, for use with multi-turn conversations. A chatID is returned in the initial response.

message.example: Which emerging technology markets are seeing the highest equity funding growth right now?

chatID.description: Identifies the conversation. If chatID was provided in the request, this will be the same.

message.description: ChatCBI response to the message. Example is an excerpt.
message.example:
# Emerging Technology Markets with Highest Equity Funding Growth

Based on the latest data, several emerging technology markets are experiencing exceptional equity funding growth. Here's a breakdown of the markets showing the most significant year-over-year percentage increases:

sources.description: List of sources used to generate the response.

example: How has the funding landscape for autonomous trucking evolved over the past 2-3 years?
Which specific companies are leading the digital twins market?

title.example: Emerging Tech Markets with Highest Funding Growth
Markets with Highest Percentage Equity Funding Growth

orgId.description: The CB Insights unique organization ID of this organization.

coiFilingDate.description: The date of the latest COI filing. This can be null if the date is not available.

conversionPrice.description: Price at which shares can be converted into another security or equity. This can be null if the conversion price is not available.

dealId.description: The unique deal ID for this transaction. This can be null if the deal ID is not available.

dividendRate.description: Dividend rate expressed as a percentage of the par value of the shares. This can be null if the dividend rate is not available.

issuancePrice.description: Original issue price per share at the time of issuance. This can be null if the issuance price is not available.

liquidationMultiple.description: Multiple of the original investment amount that investors can expect to receive upon liquidation. This can be null if the liquidation multiple is not available.

liquidationPrice.description: Price at which shares can be sold back to the company or liquidated. This can be null if the liquidation price is not available.

parValue.description: Par value of the shares. This can be null if the par value is not available.

percentageOwned.description: Percentage of total shares owned by investor(s) in this funding round. This can be null if the percentage owned is not available.

roundType.description: Name of the funding round type as per the CoI filing. This can be null if the round type is not available.

roundTypeId.description: ID of the funding round type. This can be null if the round type is not available.

sharesAuthorized.description: Number of shares authorized. This can be null if the number of shares is not available.

terms.description: Additional terms governing the round. This can be null if the terms are not available.

v2FinancialTransactions.FundingsListRequ.description: Search parameters to request available funding information for one or more organizations

limit.description: The maximum number of results to be returned in a single response. Must be in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 100.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

orgIds.description: List of Org IDs to look up, the request must contain 1 - 100 Org IDs.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results.

orgs.description: List of fundings for the requested Org IDs. If an Org ID has no funding data, it will be excluded from the response.

totalHits.description: Total number of fundings for the requested organizations.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of fundings which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' in the rare case where totalHits exceeds 10,000.

capTableHistory.description: Capitalization table history. Lists the funded organization's ownership structure.

fundings.description: List of financial transactions where the organization received funding.

capTableHistory.description: Capitalization table history. Lists the funded organization's ownership structure.

fundings.description: List of financial transactions in which the selected organization received funding.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

totalHits.description: Total number of fundings for this organization.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of fundings which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' in the rare case where totalHits exceeds 10,000.

details.description: A list of CB Insights generated insights about the deal.
example: The funding round propelled Stripe's valuation to $3.5 billion
enhancing its financial leverage in the payments sector. Investment from prominent firms.

headline.description: Headline of CB Insights generated insights about the deal.
headline.example: Stripe's valuation swells with latest funding, bolstering its market position

sources.description: A list of URLs to articles containing information about these insights.

summary.description: Summary of CB Insights generated insights about the deal.
summary.example: Stripe completed a Series C - II funding round, securing $70 million

limit.description: The maximum number of results to be returned in a single response. Must be in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 100.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

orgIds.description: List of Org IDs to look up, the request must contain 1 - 100 Org IDs.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

orgs.description: A list of investments the requested Org ID participated in.

totalHits.description: Total number of organizations with Portfolio Exits.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of organizations with Portfolio Exits which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' in the rare case where totalHits exceeds 10,000.

investments.description: List of investments the Org ID participated in.
A list of financial transactions in which the selected organization invested in another organization.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

totalHits.description: Total number of investments for this organization.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of investments which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' in the rare case where totalHits exceeds 10,000.

isFollowOn.description: Indicates if this organization had previously invested in the company.

isLead.description: Indicates if this organization took charge of the fundraising round (usually indicates that it contributed a substantial portion of the capital).

isNew.description: Indicates if this organization invested in the company (recipient) for the first time.

name.description: The name of the organization that made the investment.

orgId.description: The CB Insights unique organization ID of the organization that made the investment.

limit.description: The number of transactions to be returned in a single response. Must be in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 100.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

limit.description: The maximum number of results to be returned in a single response. Must be in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 100.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

orgIds.description: List of Org IDs to look up, the request must contain 1 - 100 Org IDs.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

orgs.description: A list of exit rounds where the requested Org ID invested prior to the exit.

totalHits.description: Total number of organizations with Portfolio Exits.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of organizations with Portfolio Exits which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' in the rare case where totalHits exceeds 10,000.

portfolioExits.description: Portfolio exits where the requested org ID invested prior to the exit.

amountInMillions.description: The value of the transaction, in millions of US dollars.

date.description: The date when the transaction took place, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dealId.description: The unique deal ID for this transaction.

insights.description: CB Insights proprietary AI generated insights about the deal.

investors.description: Organizations that participated in this transaction as investors.

isExit.description: Whether this transaction is an exit. (IPO, acquisition, etc. Always true for portfolio exits. This field is retained for compatibility.)

round.description: The name of the funding round type.

roundId.description: The unique identifier of the funding round type. See https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/funding_types/

simplifiedRound.description: A simplified name of the funding round. For example, "Acquired" and "Acq - Pending" would both be represented as "Acquisition".

sources.description: A list of URLs to articles containing information about this financial transaction.

valuationInMillions.description: The valuation of the funded organization after this transaction, in millions of US dollars.

portfolioExits.description: A list of exit rounds for companies in which the selected organization invested prior to the exit.

antiDilutionProvision.description: Anti-dilution provision for the shares issued in this funding round. This can be null if the anti-dilution provision is not available.

antiDilutionProvisionId.description: Unique identifier for the anti-dilution provision. This can be null if the anti-dilution provision is not available.

dividendPreference.description: Dividend preference for the shares issued in this funding round. This can be null if the dividend preference is not available.

dividendPreferenceId.description: Unique identifier for the dividend preference. This can be null if the dividend preference is not available.

hasBoardVotingRights.description: Indicates if the shares issued in this funding round have board voting rights. This can be null if information about board voting rights are not available.

hasGeneralVotingRights.description: Indicates if the shares issued in this funding round have general voting rights. This can be null if information about general voting rights are not available.

liquidationPreference.description: Liquidation preference for the shares issued in this funding round. This can be null if the liquidation preference is not available.

liquidationPreferenceId.description: Unique identifier for the liquidation preference. This can be null if the liquidation preference is not available.

participationRights.description: Participation rights for the shares issued in this funding round. This can be null if the participation rights are not available.

participationRightsId.description: Unique identifier for the participation rights. This can be null if the participation rights are not available.

amountInMillions.description: The value of the transaction, in millions of US dollars.

date.description: The date when the financial transaction took place, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

dealId.description: The unique deal ID for this transaction.

insights.description: CB Insights proprietary AI generated insights about the deal.

investors.description: Organizations that participated in this transaction as investors.

isExit.description: Whether this transaction is an exit. (IPO, acquisition, etc.)

recipient.description: The organization that is receiving the funding.

revenueMax.description: The maximum revenue of the funded organization at the time of this transaction, in US dollars. Typically, this value is equal to `revenueMin`.

revenueMin.description: The minimum revenue of the funded organization at the time of this transaction, in US dollars. Typically, this value is equal to `revenueMax`, but it may differ if the available data do not provide an exact number.

revenueMultipleMax.description: The maximum revenue multiple of the funded organization at the time of this transaction. Typically, this value is equal to `revenueMultipleMin`.

revenueMultipleMin.description: The minimum revenue multiple of the funded organization at the time of this transaction. Typically, this value is equal to `revenueMultipleMax`.

revenueTimePeriod.description: The time period to which the revenue and revenue multiple values pertain, typically a fiscal year or quarter.

round.description: The name of the funding round type.

roundId.description: The unique identifier of the funding round type. See https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/funding_types/

simplifiedRound.description: A simplified name of the funding round. For example, funding rounds "Series A" and "Series A - II" would both be represented as "Series A".

sources.description: A list of URLs to articles containing information about this financial transaction.

valuationInMillions.description: The valuation of the funded organization after this transaction, in millions of US dollars.

city.description: The name of the city in which the organization is located.

cityId.description: The CBI city ID of the city in which the organization is located; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

continent.description: The name of the continent in which the organization is located.

continentId.description: CBI continent ID of the continent in which the organization is located; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

country.description: The name of the country in which the organization is located.

countryId.description: The CBI country ID of the country in which the organization is located; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

postalCode.description: The postal code of the organization.

regions.description: The organization's geographical region, if applicable.

stateProvince.description: The name of the state or province in which the organization is located; also includes the constituent countries of the UK.

stateProvinceId.description: The CBI state/province ID of the state/province in which the organization is located; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

streetAddress.description: The street address of the organization.

businessModel.description: The name of the business model.

businessModelId.description: The CBI ID of the business model.

score.description: The Competitor Score of this competitor.

collectionId.description: The ID of the Expert Collection.

lastFundingDate.description: The date of the most recent funding round, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

latestRevenueMultipleMax.description: The latest maximum known revenue multiple.

latestRevenueMultipleMin.description: The latest minimum known revenue multiple.

marketCap.description: For public companies, the market capitalization of the organization in millions of US dollars.

revenueDate.description: The date of the most recent revenue data, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

revenueMax.description: The latest maximum known revenue in US dollars.

revenueMin.description: The latest minimum known revenue in US dollars. For most organizations, revenueMin is equal to revenueMax.

stockLastClose.description: For public companies, the price, in US dollars, at which it traded at the end of the previous regular trading session.

totalEquityFunding.description: Total equity funding, in millions of US dollars. This only includes rounds where equity is exchanged.

totalFunding.description: Total funding of any type raised by this organization, in millions of US dollars. This includes Grant, Accelerator, Debt, and other non-equity rounds.

valuation.description: Latest valuation on record in millions of US dollars.

v2Firmographics.FirmographicsRequestBody.description: Search parameters to request a list of organization profiles. You must pass at least one search parameter.

ciks.description: SEC Central Index Keys of organizations to match.

cityIds.description: CBI city IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

collectionIds.description: Searches for organizations within these Expert Collections.

continentIds.description: CBI continent IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

countryIds.description: CBI country IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

cusips.description: CUSIPs (Committee on Uniform Security Identification Procedures - North American security identifiers) to match.

figis.description: Financial Instrument Global Identifiers (also known as OpenFIGI) to match.

fundingInvestorTypeIds.description: Searches for organizations which have been invested in by these investor types; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/investor_type/

industryIds.description: CBI industry IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

investorOrgIds.description: Searches for organizations which have been invested in by these investors.

investorTypeIds.description: Searches for investor organizations with these investor types; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/investor_type/

isins.description: International Securities Identification Numbers to match.

keyword.description: Analogous to keyword search on the CB Insights platform. Search term to match against organization names, descriptions, and aliases.

lastFundingRoundCategoryIds.description: CBI funding round category IDs of organizations to search for. For a more granular filter, the "lastFundingRoundIds" filter can be used instead; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/funding_types/

lastFundingRoundIds.description: CBI funding round IDs of organizations. This property is used for granular filtering of the stage that most recently occurred. For detailed mapping of Funding Round IDs to investment Stages, see: https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/funding_types/#funding-round

limit.description: The maximum number of organizations to be returned in a single response.

marketIds.description: Searches for organizations that are a part of these CB Insights markets.

marketNames.description: Searches for organizations that are a part of these CB Insights markets. Supports partial matches, i.e., "AI" will return organizations in markets that include "AI" in their names.

maxCurrentHeadcount.description: Filters for organizations with a headcount less than or equal to this value

maxLastFundingDate.description: Filters for organizations which have received funding on or before the provided date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

maxTotalFundingInMillions.description: Filters for organizations which have received a total amount of funding less than or equal to this value, in millions of US dollars.

maxValuationInMillions.description: Filters for organizations with a valuation less than or equal to this value, in millions of US dollars.

minCurrentHeadcount.description: Filters for organizations with a headcount greater than or equal to this value

minLastFundingDate.description: Filters for organizations which have received funding on or after the provided date, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

minTotalFundingInMillions.description: Filters for organizations which have received a total amount of funding greater than or equal to this value, in millions of US dollars.

minValuationInMillions.description: Filters for organizations with a valuation greater than or equal to this value, in millions of US dollars.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

orgIds.description: CB Insights organization IDs to return.

orgStatusIds.description: CBI organization status IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/org_status/

regionIds.description: CBI region IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

sectorIds.description: CBI sector IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

sort.description: The order in which the results will be returned.

direction.description: The order in which the results will be returned. Available sort orders are asc and desc.

field.description: The field to be used to sort returned results. Available sort fields are orgName, orgId, lastUpdateTime, lastFundingDate, latestValuation, mosaicOverall, mosaicManagement, mosaicMarket, mosaicMomentum, mosaicMoney, headcountCurrent, headcount6MonthGrowth, headcount12MonthGrowth, and headcount24MonthGrowth.

stateProvinceIds.description: CBI state/province IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

subindustryIds.description: CBI sub-industry IDs to match; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

tickers.description: Stock tickers to match. Each may optionally include a stock exchange code, separated from the ticker by a colon; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/stock_exchanges/ for exchange codes.

urls.description: Websites of organizations to search for.

vcBacked.description: Boolean flag to match organizations that have received venture funding.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

orgs.description: A list of organization profiles that include general information like location, headcount, and industry, as well as proprietary data like business models, Competitor Scores, and Expert Collections.

totalHits.description: Total number of organizations matching the request parameters.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of organizations which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' if totalHits exceeds 10,000.

currentHeadcount.description: The current headcount of this organization.

oneYearGrowth.description: The change in this organization's headcount over the past 12 months, expressed as a decimal offset from zero (i.e. a 12.3% increase returns 0.123, and a 45.6% decrease returns -0.456).

sixMonthGrowth.description: The change in this organization's headcount over the past 6 months, expressed as a decimal offset from zero (i.e. a 12.3% increase returns 0.123, and a 45.6% decrease returns -0.456).

twoYearGrowth.description: The change in this organization's headcount over the past 24 months, expressed as a decimal offset from zero (i.e. a 12.3% increase returns 0.123, and a 45.6% decrease returns -0.456).

cusips.description: Committee on Uniform Security Identification Procedures (North American security identifiers).

figis.description: Financial Instrument Global Identifiers (also known as OpenFIGI).

tickers.description: Stock tickers associated with this organization, not including the exchange associated with each ticker.

tickersWithExchanges.description: Stock tickers associated with this organization, including the exchange of each ticker, separated by a colon.

businessModels.description: Business models for the organization. Indicates what markets a business serves and how they create revenue.

competitors.description: Competitors that CB Insights has determined are related to the company.

expertCollections.description: CB Insights analyst-curated lists of companies that this company is a part of.

financials.description: The organization's financial information, such as revenue and valuation.

headcount.description: The current and historical headcount of this organization.

taxonomy.description: CB Insights custom taxonomy where sector is the top of the hierarchy, followed by industry, and then sub-industry. Not all organizations contain all taxonomy levels.

region.description: The name of the region for this geographical location.

regionId.description: The CBI ID of the region; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/address/

additionalUrls.description: Any additional websites the organization may have.

aliases.description: Other names this organization may operate under.

description.description: A description regarding who they are and what they do.
description.example: CB is an AI super analyst specializing in market intelligence across various sectors. The company provides insights and analytics to help enterprises understand tech markets, anticipate competitor strategies, and connect with tech vendors. CB Insights offers a platform that includes a technology search engine, market analytics, and data science predictions to inform business strategies. It was founded in 2008 and is based in New York, New York.

foundedYear.description: The year this organization was founded.

investorCategory.description: If this organization is an investor, this will denote the type of investing organization. See https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/investor_type/

investorCategoryId.description: If this organization is an investor, denotes the corresponding Investor Type ID documented at https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/investor_type/

legalNames.description: Name(s) under which this organization is legally registered.

profileUrl.description: The organization's CB Insights profile URL.

stage.description: The type of investment stage that most recently occurred.

status.description: Organization status: Alive / Active, Acquired, Assets Purchased, Dead / Inactive, IPO / Went public, or Merged.

vcBacked.description: Whether this organization has received venture capital funding.

industry.description: The industry of this organization in the CB Insights industry taxonomy (mid-level)

industryId.description: The CBI ID of this industry; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

marketIds.description: IDs for CB Insights markets the organization is a part of.

marketNames.description: CB Insights markets the organization is a part of.

sector.description: The sector of this organization in the CB Insights industry taxonomy (highest level).

sectorId.description: The CBI ID of this sector; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

subindustry.description: The sub-industry of this organization in the CB Insights industry taxonomy (lowest level).

subindustryId.description: The CBI ID of this sub-industry; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/taxonomy/

degree.description: The type of degree that the person received at this insitution.

degreeId.description: The CBI ID of the degree type.

fieldOfStudy.description: The name of the field of study associated with the degree.

fieldOfStudyId.description: The CBI ID of the field of study.

graduationYear.description: The year in which the individual graduated from this institution.

institution.description: The name of the educational institution.

institutionId.description: The CBI ID of the institution.

endDate.description: The date when the individual ended this work experience, if applicable, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

isCurrent.description: Indicates whether the individual currently occupies this position.

orgId.description: The CBI organization ID of the organization for this work experience.

orgName.description: The name of the organization for this work experience.

startDate.description: The date when the individual started this work experience, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

title.description: The individual's title during this work experience.

titleId.description: The CBI ID of the individual's title during this work experience; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/person_titles/

v2ManagementAndBoard.ManagementAndBoardL.description: Search parameters to request available management and board information for one or more organizations

orgIds.description: List of Org IDs to look up, the request must contain 1 - 100 Org IDs.

titleIds.description: List of title IDs used to filter people; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/person_titles/

orgs.description: List of Management and Board information for the requested Org IDs. If an Org ID has no data, it will be excluded from the response.

managementAndBoard.description: People information and Management factor of the Mosaic score for the organization.

v2ManagementAndBoard.ManagementAndBoardR.description: Search parameters to request available management and board information for one organization

titleIds.description: List of title IDs used to filter people; see https://api-docs.cbinsights.com/docs/reference/person_titles/

mosaicManagement.description: The Management factor of the Mosaic score that measures the pedigree, education, and work experience of the leaders of the company. https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/360042055171-About-Mosaic-Health

people.description: Individuals with general information about each individual and details about their education, work experience, and board associations.

boardAssociations.description: Companies where the individual has been a board member.

education.description: Information about degrees this individual has attained.

personId.description: CBI unique ID of the individual.

workExperience.description: Work history - positions this individual has occupied.

description.example: UBIO's Robotic Transaction Automation can automate any online process. UBIO powers direct transactions for insurance, loans, flight and travel booking, and more on behalf of customers.

v2OrganizationLookup.OrgLookupRequestBod.description: Search parameters to lookup a list of organization profiles. You must pass at least one search parameter.

limit.description: The maximum number of organizations to be returned in a single response. Must be in the range [1, 100]. Defaults to 10.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results; provided in a previous response.

profileUrl.description: Returns the corresponding organization profile. Note: This is mutually exclusive with the names and urls fields; an error will be returned if there are values for profileUrl and names or urls.

sort.description: The order in which the results will be returned.

direction.description: The order in which the results will be returned. Available sort orders are asc and desc.

field.description: The field to be used to sort returned results. Available sort fields are orgName.

nextPageToken.description: Token to fetch the next page of results. If the value is null, then there are no more results to page through.

orgs.description: A list of organization profiles, includes general information for each organization.

totalHits.description: Total number of organizations matching the request parameters.

totalHitsRelation.description: Indicates whether totalHits is equal to ('eq'), or greater than or equal to ('gte') the number of organizations which can be fetched. Will be set to 'gte' if totalHits exceeds 10,000.

commercialMaturitySignals.description: Signals that are affecting the commercial maturity of the company.

maturityLevel.description: The maturity level of the company.

endDate.description: The end date of the commercial maturity score history. If provided, it must be (a) a date equal to or later than '2024-07-25' and (b) at most 24 months later than StartDate. If not provided, defaults to today's date.

startDate.description: The start date of the commercial maturity score history. If provided, it must be (a) a date equal to or later than '2024-07-25' and (b) at most 24 months ago from EndDate. If not provided, defaults to the later of '1 year ago from current date or '2024-07-25'.

asOfDate.description: The date at which the commercial maturity signals were calculated.

signals.description: Signals that are affecting the commercial maturity of the company.

exitSignals.description: Signals that are affecting the exit probability of the company.

ipo.description: The exit probability of the company within the next 2 years via an IPO.

mna.description: The exit probability of the company within the next 2 years via an M&A.

asOfDate.description: Date at which the Mosaic Score was calculated.

endDate.description: The end date of the exit probability history. If provided, it must be (a) a date equal to or later than '2025-02-25' and (b) at most 24 months later than StartDate. If not provided, defaults to today's date.

startDate.description: The start date of the exit probability history. If provided, it must be (a) a date equal to or later than '2025-02-25' and (b) at most 24 months ago from EndDate. If not provided, defaults to the later of '1 year ago from current date or '2025-02-25'.

asOfDate.description: Date at which the exit probability was calculated.

exitProbability.description: The exit probability of the company within the next 2 years.

meanProbability.description: The mean exit probability of similar companies.

ratioToMean.description: The exit probability of the company as compared to similar companies.

direction.description: The direction in which the signal is trending for the company (positive, negative, or unspecified).

signal.description: A Signal that affects the exit probability of the company.

asOfDate.description: The date at which the exit probability was calculated.

exitProbability.description: The exit probability of the company within 2 years from the date of calculation (asOfDate)

meanProbability.description: The mean exit probability of similar companies.

ratioToMean.description: The exit probability of the company as compared to similar companies.

asOfDate.description: Date at which the Mosaic Score was calculated.
The date at which the maturity level was calculated.

level.description: The maturity level of the company.

stageDescription.description: Description of the stage of the company.

startDate.description: The start date of the mosaic history data. If provided, it must be (a) a date equal to or later than '2024-01-01' and (b) at most 24 months ago from current date. If not provided, defaults to the later of '1 year ago or 2024-01-01'.

management.description: A Mosaic sub-score that measures the pedigree, education, and work experience of the leaders of the company.

market.description: A Mosaic sub-score that measures the health of the industry in which the company is categorized.

momentum.description: A Mosaic sub-score that measures the financial health of the company.

money.description: A Mosaic sub-score that measures the traction of the company based on the company’s business signals, such as vendors, partners, social media, and news sentiment.

overall.description: Overall Mosaic Score of the company. This is a composite score that measures the overall health of the company based on the company’s business signals, such as vendors, partners, social media, and news sentiment.

commercialMaturity.description: CB Insights proprietary metric to measures a private company's current ability to compete for customers or serve as a partner on a scale of 1-5.  This metric is available only for a subset of companies. More about this metric: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/25759259449485-About-Commercial-Maturity.

exitProbability.description: CB Insights Exit Probability is a proprietary machine learning algorithm that measures a private company’s chance of an IPO or M&A exit within the next 2 years. More about this metric: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/29078253654413-About-Exit-Probability

mosaicScore.description: CB Insights’ proprietary algorithm to indicate the company’s potential for success. All scores based on a scale between 0-1000. For more on our methodology and forecasting success, https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/360042055171-About-Mosaic-Health

orgIds.description: List of Org IDs to look up, the request must contain 1 - 100 Org IDs.

orgs.description:
A list of organizations with their outlook information.
If an Org ID has no data, it will be excluded from the response.

commercialMaturity.description: CB Insights proprietary metric to measures a private company's current ability to compete for customers or serve as a partner on a scale of 1-5.  This metric is available only for a subset of companies. More about this metric: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/25759259449485-About-Commercial-Maturity.

exitProbability.description: CB Insights Exit Probability is a proprietary machine learning algorithm that measures a private company’s chance of an IPO or M&A exit within the next 2 years. More about this metric: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/29078253654413-About-Exit-Probability

mosaicScore.description: CB Insights’ proprietary algorithm to indicate the company’s potential for success. All scores based on a scale between 0-1000. For more on our methodology and forecasting success, https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/articles/360042055171-About-Mosaic-Health

commercialMaturity.description: The organization's current Commercial Maturity score.

description.description: A description regarding who they are and what they do.
description.example:
Wiggle is an online cycling and tri-sports retailer. The company offers deals on mountain bikes, road bikes, bike parts, and cycle accessories.

On June 11, 2021, Wiggle was acquired by SIGNA Sports United. The terms of the transaction were not disclosed.

foundedYear.description: The year the organization was founded.

headcount.description: The current headcount of this organization.

lastFundingDate.description: The date of the most recent funding round, in the format YYYY-MM-DD.

overallMosaicScore.description: The organization's current overall Mosaic score.

stage.description: The type of investment stage that most recently occurred.

totalFunding.description: Total funding of any type raised by this organization, in millions of US dollars. This includes Grant, Accelerator, Debt, and other non-equity rounds.

orgInfo.description: Basic information & CB Insights proprietary metrics regarding the organization.

reportJson.description: Scouting Report for the organization in JSON format. Please note that citation links are currently not included in the JSON version. Example is an excerpt.
reportJson.example: {"achievements_metrics_milestones":["Merged with Chain Reaction Cycles in 2016, creating a combined entity with revenues exceeding £300 million [7]"}

reportMarkdown.description: Scouting Report for the organization in Markdown format (after parsing the JSON string). Includes citations. Example is an excerpt.
reportMarkdown.example:
# Wiggle Company Report
Wiggle is an online retailer specializing in cycling, running, and swimming gear.

## Key Takeaways

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization

tags.description: This dataset contains profiles on private companies, public companies, and investors. Includes general information like location, headcount, and industry, as well as proprietary data like business models, Competitor Scores, and Expert Collections.
tags.name: Firmographics

tags.description: This dataset contains information about funding deals, cap table history, M&As, IPOs, and CBI-generated insights that extract key themes.
tags.name: FinancialTransactions

tags.description: This dataset contains information about partnerships, clients/vendors, licensing activity, and CBI-generated insights to predict future M&As and shifts in strategy.
tags.name: BusinessRelationships

tags.description: This dataset includes leadership teams, board members, and the Management factor of the Mosaic Score — our proprietary algorithm which evaluates leadership teams based on past achievements.
tags.name: ManagementAndBoard

tags.description:
This dataset contains proprietary data science analysis including Mosaic Score, Commercial Maturity, and Exit Probability. Proven to predict winners better than top VCs.
 
 More about these proprietary datasets and methodology: https://support.cbinsights.com/hc/en-us/sections/360008544011-Proprietary-Datasets
tags.name: Outlook

tags.description: A CB Insights scouting report for a private company provides a comprehensive analysis of a business, including its market position, competitive landscape, and growth potential to offer a clear understanding of its strategic positioning. These reports are valuable for investors, partners, and stakeholders to make informed decisions based on detailed insights into the company's operations and market dynamics.
tags.name: ScoutingReports
